name: Knight Warriors
description:
Select the right knight to defend the warriors!

To play enter your name start game.  

Click the white cubes to select a character for that spot, the two front characters can be changed.  
Use the arrows by the start button to change the characters then press play.

Once things are moving click a character then click an enemy to attack
  • Front characters can attack ground floor enemies
  • The left/green character top level and mid level
  • The right/white character mid and ground floor
  • The flying character will kill all the enemies that spawned

Krass Jam, wouldn't happen with out CrudeWall!
